Section.name: About Abacus Institute of Engineering and Management
Section.description:
Abacus Institute of Engineering and Management is a private funded management and technical Institute. It was established in 2003 by some social workers and educationist to create a ‘Center for Excellence’.


Academic success is the most important factor in laying the foundation for the students & so as the College endeavors on quality academic delivery in their stride towards excellence. BTech is the most popular course at Abacus Institute of Engineering and Management. Some of the specializations available at Abacus Institute of Engineering and Management are BTech Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), BTech Electronics Engineering (EE), BTech Information Technology (IT), BTech Applied Electronics and Communication Engineering (AEIE), etc.
